nodes.text: Redstar was a Yaka pirate who preyed on Galactic Alliance shipping lanes in his ship, Night Lady, between the Yuuzhan Vong War and the Dark Nest Crisis. He was captured by Jaina Solo and Lowbacca and put on trial by the Galactic Alliance at the maximum security space station MaxSec Eight.
On a chest-plate that he wore was engraved a skull of an Ithorian.
